greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Write n = C(i,3)+C(j,2)+C(k,1) with i>j>k>=0; let L[n] = [i,j,k]; sequence gives list of triples L[n], n >= 0.
reference: D. E. Knuth, The Art of Computer Programming, vol. 4A, Combinatorial Algorithms, Section 7.2.1.3, Eq. (20), p. 360.
xref: The three columns are [A194847, A194848, A056558], or equivalently [A056556+2, A056557+1, A056558]. See A194847 for further information.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 03 2011
